${ModID}:ValorForm.NAME: Valor
DESCRIPTION: While in this #yDrive #yForm, every other attack played adds a #yShiv to your hand. NL Costs 4 #yDrive #yPoints to enter. NL Costs 2 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.

${ModID}:WisdomForm.NAME: Wisdom
DESCRIPTION: While in this #yDrive #yForm, every card played adds gains 2 #yBlock. NL Costs 4 #yDrive #yPoints to enter. NL Costs 2 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.
